PLAN TO ATTEND NAEB MEETING IN COLUMBUS
As has been the practice fox'* many years NAEB will hold a closed meeting
in connection With the annual Institute for Education by Radio at Ohio
State University. The Institute will be held May 1, 2, and 3 in Columbus <
Be there. The NAEB meeting is scheduled for Monday evening.
